context_bundle.content:
Anti-Corruption Layer (ACL) pattern.

Problem:
External systems have different models that can pollute your domain.

Solution:
Translation layer between your domain and external system.

Components:
- Facade: Simplified interface to external system
- Adapter: Translates external calls to domain
- Translator: Maps external models to domain models

Example:
External CRM has "Contact" with fields you don't need.
ACL translates to your "Customer" with clean model.

Benefits:
- Domain model stays clean
- External changes isolated
- Easier testing (mock ACL)
- Clear integration boundaries
